trans-unit.source: Starts a general browsing dialog box for disconnecting from network resources

seg-source.mrk: Starts a general browsing dialog box for disconnecting from network resources

target.mrk: Starts a general browsing dialog box for disconnecting from network resources

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Handle to the owner window for the dialog box

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the owner window for the dialog box

target.mrk: Handle to the owner window for the dialog box

trans-unit.source: Name of a local device, such as "F:" or "LPT1"

seg-source.mrk: Name of a local device, such as "F:" or "LPT1"

target.mrk: Name of a local device, such as "F:" or "LPT1"

trans-unit.source: [optional] Name of the network resource to disconnect. This member can be 0 if $LocalName is specified.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Name of the network resource to disconnect.
This member can be 0 if $LocalName is specified.

target.mrk: [optional]
Name of the network resource to disconnect.
This member can be 0 if $LocalName is specified.

trans-unit.source: When $sLocalName is specified, the connection to the network resource redirected from $sLocalName is disconnected.

seg-source.mrk: When $sLocalName is specified, the connection to the network resource redirected from $sLocalName is disconnected.

target.mrk: When $sLocalName is specified, the connection to the network resource redirected from $sLocalName is disconnected.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Flags describing the connection. Can be a combination of:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Flags describing the connection.
Can be a combination of:

target.mrk: [optional]
Flags describing the connection.
Can be a combination of:

trans-unit.source: 1 - If this value is set, the specified connection is no longer a persistent one.

seg-source.mrk: 1 - If this value is set, the specified connection is no longer a persistent one.

target.mrk: 1 - If this value is set, the specified connection is no longer a persistent one.

trans-unit.source: This flag is valid only if $sLocalName specifies a local device.

seg-source.mrk: This flag is valid only if $sLocalName specifies a local device.

target.mrk: This flag is valid only if $sLocalName specifies a local device.

trans-unit.source: 2 - If this value is NOT set, the system applies force when disconnecting

seg-source.mrk: 2 - If this value is NOT set, the system applies force when disconnecting

target.mrk: 2 - If this value is NOT set, the system applies force when disconnecting

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 1. If the user cancels the dialog box, the return value is –1.

seg-source.mrk: If the user cancels the dialog box, the return value is –1.

target.mrk: If the user cancels the dialog box, the return value is –1.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.
